message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it's a great deal for its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. While $200 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $170. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you meet me in the middle?
